reviews.review:
O jogo apesar de parecer de terror, não é, o competitivo dele tira isso do game, jogar com os amigos é divertido, mas jogar solo chega a ser estressante por conta um pouco da toxidade das pessoas que acham que você deve nascer sabendo jogar o game pra ganhar. 
Apesar de tudo ainda gostei do jogo.
也许我太菜了吧，但是你这个匹配机制什么jb玩意？劳资一个10段不到的萌新，天天打2,3段的，甚至有1段的人皇，毫无游戏体验，劳资一个人刚打倒，就3台机子了，我玩nm。RNM，给劳资改啊！
классная игра

I am actually sad I didn't play this sooner! I didn't have a good computer and couldn't run it when it first came out, but I am loving this game! Such a cool concept and nice break from the usual games I play.
整体很不错，就是匹配机制有点小问题，我现在九段屠夫把把紫红车队，当然不是不能赢，但是打得很累，全神贯注才有赢的希望，玩屠夫图个放松，这有点累我也不敢玩一些娱乐屠夫或者其他非主流玩法，人类速修压力太大啦，QQ1828571161，有兴趣可以一起来

i would not recommend this game.. honestly love the game play love the concept.. but after 10 hours of painful lag.. not due to my system at all.. that i just could not find a remedy for i can honestly say if you buy this game and have the same issue you are buying a worthless game...

if i can find a solution to this lag i would change my review

This video game is good because it is both the opposite of bad, and is playable on electronic devices by showing pictures on a screen 60 times a second (unless you're in the grass fields of Dead Dawg Saloon, because at least MY pc can't run that at 60 fps). Being playable on all major platforms with crossplay is awesome, especially since my friend is an xbox pleb. Definitely a game to be played with friends, unless you're a masochist, which, unlike most of the positive reviews I've read, I actually don't enjoy torturing myself. As someone who enjoys Overwatch and Skylanders, the unique cast of killers and survivors with their own unique-until-you-level-them-up-or-buy-them-in-the-shrine-of-secrets perks are nice. It feels like even my friend who threatens to throw me off a bridge would fit in with the cast. And speaking of that, I'mma start running, because my DbD friend told him my address, and I live near a very high bridge.
值得去玩哦

Atmospheric and engaging gameplay - there really isn't another asymmetrical multiplayer game out there that does it this well. And fortunately balancing is done quite well. Solo queue survivors will do well against a novice or intermediate Killer. However, coordinated groups (aka SWF) tend to 'break' things a bit and prove to be a bit more challenging on Killers. There's enough varied gameplay on the Killer side and enough depth to the Survivor side to keep you around.

OMG, Meg Thomas can stomp on me with her huge foot. She's better than stupid bunny feng. I recommend this game for people who aren't scared easily because it's very scary. The game has no flawed mechanic and has the best hitboxes in the west! Over all this game is better than every game out there. Forgot to mention that this game has very balanced maps and balanced killers and survivor perks. Maps that are balanced such as the Dead Dawg Saloon and The Game. Killers such as Spirit and Nurse. And survivor perks such Dead hard and Small Game. 11/20 game in my personal opinion.

I recommend this game simply because it is, in-fact, a high-quality multiplayer PvP horror game. It's unique, has many fun aspects, characters, killers and more. Some bugs of course, wonky hitboxes, survivors get all the good perks for free on the base characters while killers are left with having the amazing perks on the unlockable characters...Yeah, you can tell that I'm a little irritated.

But overall, game is fun, if only a bit unbalanced in favor of the survivors. But both sides have their pros and cons. Get it when it's on sale or if you have money to burn, that's about it. 

AND BUY IT WITH A BUNDLE FOR HAG, EXECUTIONER OR LEATHERFACE. Executioner (aka Pyramid Head, or PH) is an amazing killer that's easy to get into, but tough to master. Hag contains some of the best Hex-related perks in the entire game (namely Ruin) and Leatherface contains two perks, Franklin's Demise and BBQ & Chili. BBQ makes it so that you see all other survivors for a few seconds after hooking a survivor, and FD makes players drop their items when you hit them. That is all.
人长机上了

A new twist on the cat and mouse game of most horror games. It's a scary predicament to be in for most players, but for those who enjoy multi-player and amazing graphics, this one must play! I liked that there are a lot of options as to how you play with your remote, and also the cross platform is nice. I started out on the PS4, but had to go to the PC because it is just that good. This is a game built for the PC and so it is the best on PC.
